summary: A fictional tale based on the true events of the Lost Colony of Roanoke Island in 1587.
cast: James Alexander|Michael Armstrong|Michael Chalkley|Andy Courtney|Misha Crosby|Charlotte Hunter|Jack Juniper|Bex Key|Fraser Knight|Marcus Massey|Anthony Morter|Damian Morter|Ryan Newberry|Leander Pittis|Ivor Potter|Nick Thomas-Webster|Brogan West
title: Roanoke: The Lost Colony
